artist: Henry Stacy Marks; Minton's Pottery and Porcelain Factory
description: hand-painted tile with man at right wearing blue coat and socks, maroon breeches and black cap, and holding a walking stick, observing a large black pig in LLC; small banner at top printed:  "FLESH"; framed

title: Tile with man and pig
